ygData.subject: RE: Rarely mentioned fact...
ygData.msgSnippet: For even more fun, put a shaman in the same group as your enchanter, then shrink the charmed giant. Nothing like a gnome-sized giant to lighten the mood.
ygData.messageBody:
For even more fun, put a shaman in the same group as your enchanter, then
shrink the charmed giant.
Nothing like a gnome-sized giant to lighten the mood. Unfortunately you
can't charm Nagafen, I'd love to see a mini-lizzy.


Elwyn

-----Original Message-----
From: Dennis Gustavsson [mailto:dennis@...]
Sent: Tuesday, January 18, 2000 3:22 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Rarely mentioned fact...


From: Dennis Gustavsson <dennis@...>

Umm, just a little question.
If you pull 3 giants, why let everyone except 2 tanks attack 1 giant.
and those 2 tanks take a giant each.

We do it in a totally diffrent way, and I thought Harmonic and
people he hunt giants with used this tactic to. (since we play on the same
server).
Our enchanters charm 1 giant each and let them along with everyone else kill
the
3:rd giant. Then we let one go and kill him and keep the other one charmed.
Then finally we take the last one.

/Wintir lvl 14 bard
/Thoul 50 necro
Innoruuk server

jhenders@... wrote:
